name: Robots Attack Shooter 3D: Iron trigger fights vs dead machines
name_original: Robots Attack Shooter 3D: Iron trigger fights vs dead machines
description:
An army of robots have subdued your starship! Fight it back and take your revenge upon the arrogant iron wretches!

Steel-melting hot battle!


***** Players' opinion: *****
Johny M, USA: Such a game going out for free! Unbelievable!
Marco, Italy: Superb game! Best in the genre!


***** Different mission objectives: *****
-Survive, kill'em all, reach the checkpoint in time
-Upgrade your weapons to become stronger!
-Use your skills to achieve victory in every battle!


***** Important: *****
- Free crystals!
- Cool graphics and music!
- Superb special effects!


***** Download the game and enjoy! *****
